instruction: Describe a camping trip in the wilderness.
output: Going camping in the wilderness is a great way to get in touch with nature. You’ll get to explore the outdoors and discover beauty that you may not find near your home. A camping trip may entail pitching a tent in the middle of a secluded meadow and listening to the animals in the trees or roasting marshmallows over a campfire and sleeping under the stars. There is nothing quite like the thrill of spending some quality time in the wild!
